titleStmt.title: The history of Sr Francis Drake. Exprest by instrumentall and vocall musick, and by art of perspective in scenes, &c. The first part. Represented daily at the Cockpit in Drury-Lane, at three afternoon punctually.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop at the Anchor in the Lower walk in the New Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Printed by William Wilson. Cf. Pforzheimer Catalogue.
The 'Frontispiece' described on page 1, sometimes noted as lacking by bibliographers, is not an engraved frontispiece but merely the painted back-drop used on the stage--cf. Pforzheimer Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
